languages.text: "Я слышал, что она крепится цепями к самому небосводу. А Император самолично поднимает ее вверх".
"I heard it's chained to the firmament. And the Emperor Himself lifts it up."
languages.original_text: "Я слышал, что она крепится цепями к самому небосводу. А Император самолично поднимает ее вверх".

traits.locale_text: "I heard it's chained to the firmament. And the Emperor Himself lifts it up."
"I heard it's chained to the firmament. And the Emperor Himself lifts it up."
"I heard it's chained to the firmament. And the Emperor Himself lifts it up."
"I heard it's chained to the firmament. And the Emperor Himself lifts it up."
"I heard it's chained to the firmament. And the Emperor Himself lifts it up."
"I heard it's chained to the firmament. And the Emperor Himself lifts it up."

languages.text: 「あれは鎖で天穹につながれているって聞いたよ。皇帝陛下ご自身が持ち上げるんだってさ」
languages.original_text: "I heard it's chained to the firmament. And the Emperor Himself lifts it up."

traits.locale_text: 「あれは鎖で天穹につながれているって聞いたよ。皇帝陛下ご自身が持ち上げるんだってさ」

languages.text: "Gök kubbeye zincirliymiş diyorlar. İmparator Hazretleri'nin iradesiyle uçuyormuş."
languages.original_text: "I heard it's chained to the firmament. And the Emperor Himself lifts it up."

traits.locale_text: "Gök kubbeye zincirliymiş diyorlar. İmparator Hazretleri onu uçuruyormuş."

languages.text: «He oído que está encadenado al firmamento y el Emperador en persona lo levanta».
languages.original_text: "I heard it's chained to the firmament. And the Emperor Himself lifts it up."

traits.locale_text: «He oído que está encadenado al firmamento y el Emperador en persona lo levanta».

languages.text: “我听说那辆马车锁在天上，是帝皇亲自把它托起来的。”
languages.original_text: "I heard it's chained to the firmament. And the Emperor Himself lifts it up."

traits.locale_text: “我听说那辆马车锁在天上，是帝皇亲自把它托起来的。”

languages.text: « J'ai entendu dire qu'il était relié par des chaînes au firmament et que c'est l'Empereur lui-même qui le soulève. »
languages.original_text: "I heard it's chained to the firmament. And the Emperor Himself lifts it up."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu dire qu'il était relié par des chaînes au firmament et que c'est l'Empereur lui-même qui le soulève. »

languages.text: "Ich habe gehört, sie ist an das Firmament gekettet. Und der Imperator Selbst hebt sie an."
languages.original_text: "I heard it's chained to the firmament. And the Emperor Himself lifts it up."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe gehört, sie ist an das Firmament gekettet. Und der Imperator Selbst hebt sie an."
